With what card?: The FOSS radeon driver will give you accel on that.

You have it. It's part of xserver-xorg-video-ati
My own radeon card started getting 3D acceleration when I upgraded to edgy, but you have an older card.

You can try using the radeon driver to see if you get acceleration. Install xserver-xorg-video-ati if you don't already have it, and change your /etc/X11/xorg.conf to use the radeon driver. If you haven't modified it, you can use sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and select radeon instead.
